title: Exercise 3.9: Compute velocity from acceleration
description: Implement compute_velocity(dt, k, a) using the trapezoidal rule and create time_array/acc_array from data/acc.dat with dt=0.5.
hints: Set v(0)=0 and build time_array starting at 0 with step dt=0.5.
Read data line-by-line and convert to floats.
